text: I'm not sure if we can have configuration not APR_HAS_UNICODE_FS and not APR_HAS_ANSI_FS. In this configuration, the compiler complains about uninitialized variables (exists, hkey, rc, buf, value, bufsize) in functions ap_regkey_open, ap_regkey_value_array_get and ap_regkey_value_array_set.
